title: The Promised Life
overview: The Promised Life follows a courageous mother's quest to make a better life for her family in the face of tragedy and hardship. In the early 1920s, Carmela Carrizzo and her husband farm lands in Sicily belonging to the unscrupulous Span√≤. After a series of misfortunes, Carmela resolves to leave Italy for an uncertain but hopeful future in New York.
